api_list.name: signature generator
api_list.description: this endpoint generates a buisiness signature that you can use on emails or papers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-business-signature-generator.p.rapidapi.com/signature/template/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-business-signature-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests
